title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: O'Neil S (2026). fingertree: Monoid-Annotated 2-3 Finger Trees. R package version 0.0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {fingertree: Monoid-Annotated 2-3 Finger Trees},   author = {Shawn T. O'Neil},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.0.1}, }

title: fingertree
text: Alpha tests monoid-annotated fingertrees R. Please note repository much alpha work--progress; code inefficient, functionality missing. R/ - implementation files 2-3 finger tree monoids. scripts/monoids_demo.R - demo/exploration monoid-annotated binary trees (2-3 finger trees). scripts/monoids_typed.R - typed monoid/tree implementation using lambda.r. scripts/ - demo/experiment scripts finger trees plotting.

title: Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
code: MeasureMonoid(f, i, measure)

title: Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
text: f Associative binary function measure values. Identity measure value `f`. measure Function mapping raw element measure value.

title: Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
Construct a MeasureMonoid — MeasureMonoid
code: sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) t <- tree_from(1:5) reduce_left(t, sum_m) #> [1] 15  # Measure from element metadata t2 <- tree_from(letters[1:3], values = c(10, 20, 30)) value_sum <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, function(el) as.numeric(attr(el, "value"))) reduce_right(t2, value_sum) #> Error in r$f(t, acc): non-numeric argument to binary operator

what: Construct a split predicate wrapper — Predicate
title: Construct a split predicate wrapper — Predicate
Construct a split predicate wrapper — Predicate
code: Predicate(f)

title: Construct a split predicate wrapper — Predicate
text: f Predicate function accumulated measure values.

title: Construct a split predicate wrapper — Predicate
Construct a split predicate wrapper — Predicate
code: p <- Predicate(function(v) v >= 3) #> Error in Function(f): could not find function "Function" p(2) #> Error in p(2): could not find function "p" p(3) #> Error in p(3): could not find function "p"  t <- tree_from(letters[1:5]) locate(t, p, ".size") #> Error: object 'p' not found

what: Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
title: Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
code: add_monoids(t, monoids, overwrite = FALSE)

title: Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
text: t FingerTree. monoids Named list `MeasureMonoid` objects add. overwrite Logical; whether overlapping names replace existing monoids.

title: Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
Add/merge monoids on an existing tree — add_monoids
code: t <- tree_from(1:5) sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) t2 <- add_monoids(t, list(sum = sum_m)) attr(t2, "measures")$sum #> [1] 15  # Replace an existing monoid definition sum2 <- MeasureMonoid(function(a, b) a + 2 * b, 0, as.numeric) t3 <- add_monoids(t2, list(sum = sum2), overwrite = TRUE) attr(t3, "measures")$sum #> [1] 60

title: Append an element — append
Append an element — append
code: append(t, x)

title: Append an element — append
Append an element — append
Append an element — append
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:3]) t2 <- append(t, "d") t2[[4]] #> [1] "d"  # Compose with prepend and reduce cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_right(prepend(t2, "z"), cat_m) #> [1] "zabcd"

title: Concatenate two trees — concat_trees
text: -name monoids assumed equivalent; left-tree definitions win. Missing monoids added side concatenation.

title: Concatenate two trees — concat_trees
code: concat_trees(x, y)

title: Concatenate two trees — concat_trees
text: x Left tree. y Right tree.

title: Concatenate two trees — concat_trees
Concatenate two trees — concat_trees
code: left <- tree_from(letters[1:3]) right <- tree_from(letters[4:6]) t <- concat_trees(left, right) cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_left(t, cat_m) #> [1] "abcdef"  # Concatenate trees carrying a custom monoid sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) a <- tree_from(1:3, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) b <- tree_from(4:5, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) t2 <- suppressWarnings(concat_trees(a, b)) attr(t2, "measures")$sum #> [1] 15

what: Create an empty finger tree — empty_tree
title: Create an empty finger tree — empty_tree
Create an empty finger tree — empty_tree
code: empty_tree(monoids = NULL)

title: Create an empty finger tree — empty_tree
Create an empty finger tree — empty_tree
Create an empty finger tree — empty_tree
code: t <- empty_tree() t #> [[1]] #> NULL #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "Empty"      "FingerTree" "list"       #> attr(,"monoids") #> attr(,"monoids")$.size #> $f #> function(a, b) a + b #> <environment: 0x117baca58> #>  #> $i #> [1] 0 #>  #> $measure #> function(el) 1 #> <environment: 0x117baca58> #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "MeasureMonoid" "list"          #>  #> attr(,"measures") #> attr(,"measures")$.size #> [1] 0 #>   count_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, function(el) 1) t2 <- empty_tree(monoids = list(count = count_m)) attr(t2, "measures") #> $count #> [1] 0 #>  #> $.size #> [1] 0 #>

title: Build graph data frames for a finger tree — get_graph_df
Build graph data frames for a finger tree — get_graph_df
text: list edge node data frames igraph plotting.

title: Build graph data frames for a finger tree — get_graph_df
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:4]) gdf <- get_graph_df(t) #> Error in rstack(): could not find function "rstack" names(gdf) #> Error: object 'gdf' not found nrow(gdf[[1]]) #> Error: object 'gdf' not found  # Works for deeper trees too t2 <- tree_from(letters[1:10]) gdf2 <- get_graph_df(t2) #> Error in rstack(): could not find function "rstack" nrow(gdf2[[2]]) #> Error: object 'gdf2' not found

what: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
text: Read-analogue `split_tree()`: finds distinguished element scan predicate flips, rebuild left/right trees.

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
code: locate(t, predicate, monoid_name, accumulator = NULL, include_metadata = FALSE)

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
text: t FingerTree. predicate Function accumulated measure values. monoid_name Name monoid `attr(t, "monoids")`. accumulator Optional starting measure (defaults monoid identity). include_metadata Logical; include left/hit/right measures index.

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
text: `include_metadata = FALSE`: `list(found, elem)`.   `TRUE`: `list(found, elem, metadata = list(left_measure, hit_measure,   right_measure, index))`.

title: Locate first predicate flip without reconstructing context trees — locate
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:6]) locate(t, function(v) v >= 4, ".size") #> $found #> [1] TRUE #>  #> $elem #> [1] "d" #>   # Metadata-rich locate for custom monoid sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) t2 <- tree_from(1:6, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) locate(t2, function(v) v >= 10, "sum", include_metadata = TRUE) #> $found #> [1] TRUE #>  #> $elem #> [1] 4 #>  #> $metadata #> $metadata$left_measure #> [1] 6 #>  #> $metadata$hit_measure #> [1] 10 #>  #> $metadata$right_measure #> [1] 11 #>  #> $metadata$index #> [1] 4 #>  #>

what: Plot a finger tree with igraph — plot_tree
title: Plot a finger tree with igraph — plot_tree
Plot a finger tree with igraph — plot_tree
code: plot_tree(   t1,   vertex.size = 4,   edge.width = 1,   label_edges = FALSE,   title = NULL,   node_label = c("value", "type", "both", "none"),   ... )

title: Plot a finger tree with igraph — plot_tree
text: t1 FingerTree. vertex.size Vertex size passed `igraph::plot.igraph`. edge.width Edge width passed `igraph::plot.igraph`. label_edges Whether draw edge labels. title Optional plot title. node_label Node label mode: value, type, , none. ... Additional arguments passed `igraph::plot.igraph`.

title: Plot a finger tree with igraph — plot_tree
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ t <- tree_from(letters[1:8]) plot_tree(t, title = "Finger tree")  t2 <- tree_from(letters[1:12]) plot_tree(t2, node_label = "both", vertex.size = 8) } # }

title: Prepend an element — prepend

code: t <- tree_from(letters[2:4]) t2 <- prepend(t, "a") t2[[1]] #> [1] "a"  # Compose with append and reduce cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_left(append(t2, "z"), cat_m) #> [1] "abcdz"

what: Split tree into left and right parts — split
title: Split tree into left and right parts — split
Split tree into left and right parts — split
code: split(t, predicate, monoid_name)

title: Split tree into left and right parts — split
text: t FingerTree. predicate Function measure values. monoid_name Name monoid `attr(t, "monoids")`.

title: Split tree into left and right parts — split
Split tree into left and right parts — split
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:6]) s <- split(t, function(v) v >= 4, ".size") attr(s$left, "measures")$.size #> [1] 3 attr(s$right, "measures")$.size #> [1] 3  cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_left(s$left, cat_m) #> [1] "abc" reduce_left(s$right, cat_m) #> [1] "def"

title: Split tree around first predicate flip — split_tree
code: split_tree(t, predicate, monoid_name, accumulator = NULL)

title: Split tree around first predicate flip — split_tree
text: t FingerTree. predicate Function measure values. monoid_name Name monoid `attr(t, "monoids")`. accumulator Optional starting measure (defaults monoid identity).

title: Split tree around first predicate flip — split_tree
Split tree around first predicate flip — split_tree
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:6]) s <- split_tree(t, function(v) v >= 4, ".size") s$elem #> [1] "d"  cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_left(s$left, cat_m) #> [1] "abc" reduce_left(s$right, cat_m) #> [1] "ef"

title: Subset a finger tree by positive integer indices — [.FingerTree
text: new FingerTree containing selected elements index order.

title: Subset a finger tree by positive integer indices — [.FingerTree
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:6]) s <- t[c(2, 4, 6)] cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_left(s, cat_m) #> [1] "bdf"  # Empty index returns empty tree attr(t[integer(0)], "measures")$.size #> [1] 0

title: Extract a single element from a finger tree by 1-based index — [[.FingerTree
Extract a single element from a finger tree by 1-based index — [[.FingerTree
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:5]) t[[3]] #> [1] "c"  # Named extraction for structural fields (internal/debug usage) d <- tree_from(letters[1:3]) d[["prefix"]] #> [[1]] #> [1] "a" #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "Digit" "list"  #> attr(,"monoids") #> attr(,"monoids")$.size #> $f #> function(a, b) a + b #> <environment: 0x110df9690> #>  #> $i #> [1] 0 #>  #> $measure #> function(el) 1 #> <environment: 0x110df9690> #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "MeasureMonoid" "list"          #>  #> attr(,"measures") #> attr(,"measures")$.size #> [1] 1 #>

title: Replace a single element by 1-based index — [[<-.FingerTree

code: # S3 method for class 'FingerTree' x[[i]] <- value

title: Replace a single element by 1-based index — [[<-.FingerTree
text: x FingerTree. Positive scalar integer index. value Replacement element.

title: Replace a single element by 1-based index — [[<-.FingerTree
Replace a single element by 1-based index — [[<-.FingerTree
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:4]) t[[2]] <- "ZZ" cat_m <- MeasureMonoid(paste0, "", as.character) reduce_left(t, cat_m) #> [1] "aZZcd"  # Character index updates internal field (advanced/debug usage) u <- tree_from(letters[1:3]) u[["prefix"]] <- u$prefix

title: Replace selected elements by positive integer indices — [<-.FingerTree
text: x FingerTree. Positive integer index vector. value Replacement values; must exactly length ``.

title: Replace selected elements by positive integer indices — [<-.FingerTree
Replace selected elements by positive integer indices — [<-.FingerTree
code: t <- tree_from(1:6) t[c(2, 5)] <- list(20, 50) sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) reduce_left(t, sum_m) #> [1] 84  # Replacement length must match try(t[c(1, 2)] <- list(999)) #> Error in `[<-.FingerTree`(`*tmp*`, c(1, 2), value = list(999)) :  #>   Replacement length must match index length exactly.

what: Build a tree from a vector or list — tree_from
title: Build a tree from a vector or list — tree_from
Build a tree from a vector or list — tree_from
code: tree_from(x, values = NULL, monoids = NULL)

title: Build a tree from a vector or list — tree_from
text: x Elements insert. values Optional parallel values (length `x`). monoids Optional named list `MeasureMonoid` objects.

title: Build a tree from a vector or list — tree_from
Build a tree from a vector or list — tree_from
code: t <- tree_from(letters[1:4]) t[[2]] #> [1] "b"  sum_m <- MeasureMonoid(`+`, 0, as.numeric) t2 <- tree_from(1:5, monoids = list(sum = sum_m)) attr(t2, "measures") #> $sum #> [1] 15 #>  #> $.size #> [1] 5 #>
